summary: Morokei replaced by a gold ruby circlet.
descriptionHtml:
Tired of Morokei causing your head to turn invisible?  Think a clearly Mage oriented item shouldn\'t be tagged \"Light Armor\" and ruin a key Alteration perk?

DESCRIPTION
============
This modification changes Morokei to a gold and ruby circlet.  It has the appearance of a circlet, it works with all robes (at least as well as circlets do) and is clothing so it does not interfere with the Mage Armor perk in Alteration.  Any changes in the mesh or textures you have for the gold and ruby circlet will affect Morokei such as HD replacement textures.

INSTALLATION
=============
1. Drop into your Skyrim/Data folder.
2. Select the ESP under \"Data Files\" in the Skyrim launcher.
3. Play the game.

UNINSTALLATION
================
Delete or uncheck the ESP.
author: kab
